list_definition.definition: the set of qualities that make someone or something different from others; type

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You can tell a man’s character from his handwriting
Publicity of this character is not good for the firm.

list_definition.definition: a set of qualities that are considered admirable in some way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He showed great character in dealing with the danger.
They tried to damage his character.

list_definition.definition: a person in a play, novel etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Rosencrantz is a minor character in Shakespeare’s ‘Hamlet’.

list_definition.definition: a letter used in typing etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Some characters on this keyboard are broken.
